body: I agree those ppl should die

You know what fuck up about this type of scenario? Only her fight against the wave of enemies,  not a single forces of peace keepers like the police or the military or even some brave passengers . Everyone else just... watch,  that it. What the point of staying large group and do nothing but watching monster kill their guardian? After her,  they're next. I hope we get to see them all die and suffer for their inaction
